function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Systemic gender-based violence and femicide","Impact":"Continued harm and violence towards marginalized groups","Mitigation":"Education, awareness, and legal measures to address gender-based violence","Technologies":"Legal and policy frameworks, educational campaigns","People":"Marginalized individuals, women, gender non-conforming individuals","Owner":"Government, NGOs, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Lack of criminalization of IPV in some countries","Impact":"Allows for the perpetuation of social harm and violence","Mitigation":"Advocacy for legal reform and enforcement of protective measures","Technologies":"Legal reforms, advocacy campaigns","People":"Victims of IPV, marginalized communities","Owner":"Advocacy groups, legal entities, government"},{"Description":"Lack of qualitative data and victim voices in accounts of violence","Impact":"Lack of understanding and empathy towards victims, hindering effective interventions","Mitigation":"Collecting qualitative data, elevating victim narratives, and trauma-informed support services","Technologies":"Data collection tools, survivor advocacy platforms","People":"Victims of IPV and DV, support organizations, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, support organizations, survivors"}]}
